sys_variable_value.value:
#!/bin/bash
result=$(cat <<EOF from selenium import webdriver from selenium.webdriver.chrome.service import Service from selenium.webdriver.common.keys import Keys import time
service = Service('/home/kali/Downloads/chromedriver-linux64/chromedriver')
def get_driver(url): #Set options to make browsing easier options = webdriver.ChromeOptions() options.add_argument("disable-infobars") options.add_argument("--start-maximized") options.add_argument("window-size=1200x600") options.add_argument("--disable-dev-shm-usage") options.add_argument("--no-sandbox") options.add_argument('--headless') options.add_argument("--disable-extensions"); options.add_experimental_option("excludeSwitches", ["enable-automation"]) options.add_argument("disable-blink- features=AutomationControlled")
driver =webdriver.Chrome(service=service,options=options) driver.get(url) return driver
def main(): driver=get_driver("https://dev224588.service-now.com") driver.find_element(by="id",value="user_name").send_keys("admin") time.sleep(2) driver.find_element(by="id",value="user_password").send_keys("Y@w*5p2ZFeXq" + Keys.RETURN) get_url = driver.current_url driver.quit() return str(get_url)
print(main())
EOF )
python3 -c "$result"

sys_hub_action_output.label: Details

result=$(cat <<EOF from selenium import webdriver from selenium.webdriver.chrome.service import Service from selenium.webdriver.common.keys import Keys import time
service = Service('/home/kali/Downloads/chromedriver-linux64/chromedriver')
def get_driver(url): #Set options to make browsing easier options = webdriver.ChromeOptions() options.add_argument("disable-infobars") options.add_argument("--start-maximized") options.add_argument("window-size=1200x600") options.add_argument("--disable-dev-shm-usage") options.add_argument("--no-sandbox") options.add_argument('--headless') options.add_argument("--disable-extensions"); options.add_experimental_option("excludeSwitches", ["enable-automation"]) options.add_argument("disable-blink- features=AutomationControlled")
driver =webdriver.Chrome(service=service,options=options) driver.get(url) return driver
def main(): driver=get_driver("https://dev224588.service-now.com") driver.find_element(by="id",value="user_name").send_keys("admin") time.sleep(2) driver.find_element(by="id",value="user_password").send_keys("Y@w*5p2ZFeXq" + Keys.RETURN) get_url = driver.current_url driver.quit() return str(get_url)
print(main())
EOF )
